items.title: 吴泳铭掌舵两年，阿里AI起飞
items.raw_excerpt: 9 月 24 日下午，云栖小镇 D2-9 场馆，一场以 1688 AI 为主题的论坛开场。场馆面积不小，但将近 3 小时的分享，座位早早被占满，后排空地也被人群挤得寸步难行。 热度不仅限于这一场。 不论是在硬核技术主题论坛，还是充满机器人、汽车的应用馆，四处人头攒动。 一位连续多年参会的从业者笑言：“今年的云栖大会场馆是前脚掌踩后脚跟，比过去几年都热闹。” 一位理想员工发微博说，本是一个产业链产品技术的交流会议，没想到工作人员反馈，现场收获了相当可观的线索和订单。 今年是云栖大会举办的第 10 个年头，每年的云栖大会都是了解最新技术趋势的窗口。随着大模型技术的发展，这几年的云栖大会成为了 AI 行业的风向标，也是观察阿里在云与 AI 战略上下一步棋的绝佳场合。 执掌阿里两年来，阿里巴巴集团CEO吴泳铭反复强调“用户为先，AI驱动”战略，他旗帜鲜明地提出，AI技术对所有行业的改变升级以及AI与云计算的深度结合，是未来十年技术领域最大的行业机会。 在阿里内部，阿里全方位践行AI投入承诺并收获成效。 不仅是阿里云，高德、钉钉等业务也全面AI化，在AI to C领域，阿里发布首款自研AI眼镜夸克AI眼镜。电商业务中，AI工具“全站推广”持续带动淘天商家经营效率提升，在商家的渗透率连续多季持续提升。淘宝使用大模型让“猜你喜欢”更精准，测试显示用户加购次数和停留时长均提升超5%。阿里巴巴国际站的商家也采用AI驱动工具用于市场营销、采购和产品上架。 今年云栖大会上，一场开场23分钟的演讲让阿里市值狂飙，这位技术派掌门人又释放了哪些信号？阿里在 AI 云赛道的两年变革，又如何在这里得到印证？ 从云栖大会，看阿里AI路线 今年雷峰网参加云栖大会最大的感受是，大模型浪潮奔涌两年后，阿里对AI路线规划愈发清晰。 论坛第一天，阿里CEO吴泳铭在演讲中，有一个核心关键词不断被提及：ASI，即超级人工

excerpt_i18n.en: On the afternoon of September 24, a forum themed around 1688 AI kicked off at the D2-9 venue in Yunqi Town. The venue was spacious, but nearly three hours into the event, seats were fully occupied early on, and the standing area at the back was packed to the point of being impassable. The buzz wasn't limited to this session alone. Whether at forums focused on hardcore technology or exhibition halls filled with robots and cars, crowds were everywhere. A veteran attendee joked, "This year's Yunqi Conference is so crowded you're stepping on heels—it's livelier than in previous years." An employee from Li Auto posted on Weibo that what started as an industry chain product and tech exchange unexpectedly generated significant leads and orders on-site, according to staff feedback. This year marks the 10th anniversary of the Yunqi Conference, an annual event that serves as a window into the latest tech trends. With the advancement of large model technology, recent editions have become a barometer for the AI industry and a prime opportunity to observe Alibaba's next moves in cloud and AI strategy. Since taking the helm at Alibaba two years ago, Group CEO Wu Yongming has repeatedly emphasized the "user-first, AI-driven" strategy, clearly stating that AI's transformative impact across all industries and its deep integration with cloud computing represent the biggest opportunity in the tech sector over the next decade. Internally, Alibaba is fully committed to its AI investment, yielding results. Beyond Alibaba Cloud, businesses like Amap and DingTalk are also undergoing comprehensive AI integration. In the AI-to-C domain, Alibaba launched its first self-developed AI glasses, Kua.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 24 de septiembre por la tarde, comenzó un foro sobre 1688 AI en el pabellón D2-9 de Yunqi Town. Aunque el espacio era amplio, casi 3 horas de presentaciones hicieron que los asientos se ocuparan pronto y las zonas traseras quedaran abarrotadas. El entusiasmo no se limitó a este evento. Tanto en foros técnicos especializados como en pabellones de aplicaciones con robots y coches, había multitudes por todas partes. Un asistente habitual comentó con humor: "Este año en Yunqi Conference la gente está tan apretada que no cabe un alfiler, más animado que en años anteriores". items.title: 海康威视：做得好安防，能否做得好工业？
items.raw_excerpt: 作者丨路遥 编辑丨余快 近日中国国际工业博览会上，不少人恍然：海康入局工业了。 其实，从大众熟知的安防领域，到深入工业的“毛细血管”，海康的工业路，已悄悄走了十余年。 过去的海康，以安防立身，以智能物联为千行百业搭台而闻名。 如今，它进一步沉到制造现场，为制造业带来的不仅是一个个场景的智能化改变，更拓展了价值创造的更多可能。 因此，海康面临的一大课题在于，如何进一步扎实根基，让自身的工业能力始终保持鲜活与独特。 在千行百业的场景中持续思考与实践，造就了海康当下的技术优势，并将深刻影响其未来所能创造价值的深度与广度。 对于工业，刚刚亮相中国国际工业博览会的海康，已给出明确回应：携“物联感知+AI”，扎进工业深处。 工博会上，上百款软硬件产品、海康观澜大模型具体场景应用一起登场，这不是试水，而是展示了其综合能力的重要一隅。 那么，什么是“物联感知+AI”？做得好安防的海康，能否做得好工业？ 海康做工业，一场技术和市场的双向奔赴 提及海康，多数人的第一印象仍是“安防巨头”，但早在2015年，它就攥着工业相机这把钥匙，悄悄推开了工业领域的大门。 海康做工业，绝非“跨界跟风”，而是技术积累到一定阶段的自然破局。 事实上，工业是海康技术能力开花结果的“新战场”，在安防领域打磨的可见光、红外、X光、声波等感知技术，恰好与工业场景的数字化需求高度契合。 安防要“看清异常”，工业要“感知数据”；安防要“智能预警”，工业要“预测性维护”，二者都既需要感知，又需要智能。 20余年来，从可见光起步，一路拓展至X光、紫外、红外、毫米波、激光、融合光谱、声波等多维感知，构建起覆盖30000多种硬件型号的“产品矩阵”，可以给机器装上“眼耳鼻舌”，设备振动、物料温度、产品缺陷、物质成分等，都能被转化为可分析的数字数据，解决工业“物理世界数字化”的核心痛点。 市场端，中国工业也正面临着“数字化饥渴”。 中国

title_i18n.en: Hikvision: Excelling in security, can it succeed in the industrial sector?

excerpt_i18n.en:
Author: Lu Yao  Editor: Yu Kuai  
At the recent China International Industry Fair, many were surprised to realize that Hikvision has entered the industrial sector. In fact, Hikvision has quietly been on this industrial path for over a decade, transitioning from its well-known security domain to penetrating the intricate "capillaries" of industry.  
Previously known for establishing itself in security and building platforms with smart IoT for various sectors, Hikvision is now delving deeper into manufacturing sites. It brings not only intelligent transformations to individual scenarios but also expands the possibilities for value creation.  
A key challenge for Hikvision is how to solidify its foundation further, ensuring its industrial capabilities remain dynamic and distinctive. Continuous reflection and practice across diverse industrial scenarios have shaped Hikvision’s current technological edge, which will profoundly influence the depth and breadth of value it can generate in the future.  
At the Industry Fair, Hikvision made a clear statement about its industrial ambitions: diving deep into industry with "IoT sensing + AI." Showcasing over a hundred hardware and software products, along with specific applications of its Guanlan large model, this was not a tentative step but a display of a significant part of its comprehensive capabilities.  
So, what is "IoT sensing + AI"? Can Hikvision, excelling in security, succeed in industry?  
Hikvision’s move into industry represents a convergence of technology and market forces. While most still see it as a "security giant," as early as 2015, it was already quietly entering the industrial field with industrial cameras as its key. This is not a case of "jumping on the bandwagon" but the result of accumulated technological expertise.
excerpt_i18n.es: Autor: Lu Yao. Editor: Yu Kuai. Recientemente, en la Feria Internacional de la Industria de China, muchos se dieron cuenta: Hikvision ha entrado en el sector industrial. En realidad, desde el conocido campo de la seguridad hasta adentrarse en los "capilares" de la industria, el camino industrial de Hikvision ha sido recorrido en silencio durante más de diez años. En el pasado, Hikvision se consolidó con la seguridad y se hizo famosa por conectar múltiples industrias con la internet de las cosas inteligente. Hoy, se sumerge aún más en el entorno manufacturero, aportando no solo cambios inteligentes en diversos escenarios, sino también expandiendo las posibilidades de creación de valor. Por lo tanto, un gran desafío para Hikvision es cómo consolidar aún más sus bases, manteniendo siempre su capacidad industrial fresca y única. Reflexionando continuamente en los escenarios de múltiples industrias.

excerpt_i18n.en:
At the 2025 Yunqi Conference, Tmall Genie Future Hotel 4.0's three major AI solutions and the establishment of the "Future Hotel AI Agent Alliance" marked the hotel industry's shift from single-point intelligence to comprehensive intelligence, initiating an industry transformation centered on ecosystem collaboration. On September 24, 2025, at the Hangzhou Yunqi Town International Convention and Exhibition Center, Tmall Genie Future Hotel unveiled Future Hotel 4.0 at the 2025 Yunqi Conference, featuring three core solutions: an AI-driven desktop marketing system, a speaker-based new calling system that replaces traditional phones, and a multi-agent collaborative super AI assistant team, helping the hotel industry transition from "functional intelligence" to "scenario intelligence." During the launch, Tmall Genie Future Hotel also partnered with Delonix Group, BTG Homeinns, DingTalk Travel, Billy Info, and Meisu Zait to establish the "Future Hotel AI Agent Alliance," committed to co-creating technical standards, building an open ecosystem, and sharing intelligent benefits. 

Industry challenges: The hotel sector urgently needs to break free from traditional models. According to the "2025 China Hotel Industry Development Report," by the end of 2024, the domestic hotel chain rate had dropped to 40.09%, indicating a shift from rapid growth to high-quality development. China's hotel industry stands at a crossroads between "scale bubbles" and "value refinement." Meanwhile, labor costs continue to rise, traditional service models remain inefficient, user demands are increasingly fragmented, Gen Z consumers seek immersive experiences, and industry profit growth is sluggish, with cost reduction and efficiency improvement remaining core challenges. The hotel industry must move beyond competition based on scale and quantity.
excerpt_i18n.es: En la Cumbre de la Nube 2025, las tres soluciones de IA del Hotel del Futuro 4.0 de Tmall Genie y el establecimiento de la "Alianza de Agentes de IA para Hoteles del Futuro" marcan la transición de la industria hotelera de la inteligencia puntual a la inteligencia integral, iniciando una transformación industrial centrada en la colaboración ecológica. El 24 de septiembre de 2025, en el Centro Internacional de Convenciones y Exposiciones de Cloud Town en Hangzhou, Tmall Genie presentó el Hotel del Futuro 4.0 durante la Cumbre de la Nube, incluyendo tres soluciones clave: un sistema de marketing de escritorio impulsado por IA, un nuevo sistema de comunicación por altavoz que revoluciona los teléfonos tradicionales y un equipo de asistente superinteligente con colaboración multiagente, facilitando la evolución de la industria hotelera de la "inteligencia funcional" a la "inteligencia contextual".

items.title: 不靠英伟达，中科院在国产 GPU 上跑通 76B 类脑大模型
items.raw_excerpt: 过去几年，大模型几乎都依赖 Transformer，它支撑了 GPT、Claude、Gemini 等一众前沿模型的进步，但也一直被诟病：一旦文本变长，计算量和内存消耗就会成倍膨胀，百万级 token 几乎不可承受。与此同时，大模型训练几乎完全依赖 NVIDIA 的 GPU 体系。从算力到软件栈，整个行业被牢牢绑定在 CUDA 上，硬件自主化成了迟迟迈不过去的门槛。 正因为如此，业界一直在寻找“下一条路”。有人尝试混合架构，有人研究稀疏专家，也有人试水类脑计算。但这些探索往往停留在小规模实验，很少能真正跑到大模型层面。 直到最近，中科院团队抛出了一篇新论文，提出了一个全新系列的类脑大模型 SpikingBrain。他们通过引入 spiking 神经元、线性注意力和稀疏专家机制，不仅在超长文本处理上实现了 百倍加速，还首次在 国产 GPU 平台 MetaX 上稳定训练出 76B 规模的模型。 同时，SpikingBrain 的问世也证明了大模型并不是只能依赖 Transformer + NVIDIA 的组合，另一条通往未来的道路正在被打开。 论文链接：https://www.arxiv.org/pdf/2509.05276 大模型的新答案 在实验中，研究团队在超长上下文任务上取得了突破性成果。以 SpikingBrain-7B 为例，当输入长度达到 400 万 token 时，其 Time-to-First-Token（首个 token 生成延迟）比传统 Transformer 快了 100 倍。换句话说，原本需要长时间等待的超长文本任务，如今几乎可以做到即时响应。 由于脉冲神经元只在必要时才会“放电”，模型在推理过程中保持了 69.15% 的稀疏激活率——也就是说，大多数神经元在大部分时间处于静默状态，不参与计算。相比始终全量激活的 lf，这种机制显著降低了算力消耗和能耗。

title_i18n.zh: 不靠英伟达，中科院在国产 GPU 上跑通 76B 类脑大模型
title_i18n.en: Without relying on NVIDIA, the Chinese Academy of Sciences successfully ran a 76B brain-inspired large model on a domestic GPU.
title_i18n.es: Sin depender de Nvidia, la Academia China de Ciencias ejecuta con éxito un modelo cerebral grande de 76B en GPU nacional.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 过去几年，大模型几乎都依赖 Transformer，它支撑了 GPT、Claude、Gemini 等一众前沿模型的进步，但也一直被诟病：一旦文本变长，计算量和内存消耗就会成倍膨胀，百万级 token 几乎不可承受。与此同时，大模型训练几乎完全依赖 NVIDIA 的 GPU 体系。从算力到软件栈，整个行业被牢牢绑定在 CUDA 上，硬件自主化成了迟迟迈不过去的门槛。 正因为如此，业界一直在寻找“下一条路”。有人尝试混合架构，有人研究稀疏专家，也有人试水类脑计算。但这些探索往往停留在小规模实验，很少能真正跑到大模型层面。 直到最近，中科院团队抛出了一篇新论文，提出了一个全新系列的类脑大模型 SpikingBrain。他们通过引入 spiking 神经元、线性注意力和稀疏专家机制，不仅在超长文本处理上实现了 百倍加速，还首次在 国产 GPU 平台 MetaX 上稳定训练出 76B 规模的模型。 同时，SpikingBrain 的问世也证明了大模型并不是只能依赖 Transformer + NVIDIA 的组合，另一条通往未来的道路正在被打开。 论文链接：https://www.arxiv.org/pdf/2509.05276 大模型的新答案 在实验中，研究团队在超长上下文任务上取得了突破性成果。以 SpikingBrain-7B 为例，当输入长度达到 400 万 token 时，其 Time-to-First-Token（首个 token 生成延迟）比传统 Transformer 快了 100 倍。换句话说，原本需要长时间等待的超长文本任务，如今几乎可以做到即时响应。 由于脉冲神经元只在必要时才会“放电”，模型在推理过程中保持了 69.15% 的稀疏激活率——也就是说，大多数神经元在大部分时间处于静默状态，不参与计算。相比始终全量激活的 lf，这种机制显著降低了算力消耗和能耗。
excerpt_i18n.en:
In recent years, large models have almost exclusively relied on the Transformer architecture, which has driven advancements in cutting-edge models like GPT, Claude, and Gemini. However, it has long been criticized for exponentially increasing computational and memory demands as text length grows, making processing millions of tokens nearly unfeasible. Meanwhile, large model training has been almost entirely dependent on NVIDIA's GPU ecosystem, with the entire industry tightly bound to CUDA from computing power to software stacks, making hardware independence a persistent barrier.

As a result, the industry has been searching for an alternative path. Some have experimented with hybrid architectures, others explored sparse expert systems, and some ventured into brain-inspired computing. Yet these efforts often remained small-scale experiments, rarely scaling to large model levels.

Recently, a team from the Chinese Academy of Sciences published a new paper proposing a novel series of brain-inspired large models called SpikingBrain. By incorporating spiking neurons, linear attention, and sparse expert mechanisms, they achieved a hundredfold acceleration in ultra-long text processing and, for the first time, stably trained a 76B-scale model on the domestic GPU platform MetaX.

The emergence of SpikingBrain also demonstrates that large models are not limited to the Transformer + NVIDIA combination, opening another path toward the future.

Paper link: https://www.arxiv.o
excerpt_i18n.es: En los últimos años, casi todos los grandes modelos han dependido del Transformer, que ha impulsado avances en modelos punteros como GPT, Claude y Gemini. Sin embargo, siempre se le ha criticado por el hecho de que, una vez que el texto se alarga, el cálculo y el consumo de memoria se multiplican exponencialmente, haciendo casi inmanejable millones de tokens. Al mismo tiempo, el entrenamiento de grandes modelos depende casi por completo del ecosistema de GPU de NVIDIA. Desde la capacidad de cálculo hasta el stack de software, toda la industria está firmemente vinculada a CUDA, convirtiendo la autonomía hardware en un obstáculo insuperable. Precisamente por ello, el sector siempre ha buscado "un camino alternativo". Algunos han probado arquitecturas híbridas, otros han investigado la especialización dispersa.

items.title: 基础设施进入 Agent 时代：无问芯穹的“蜂群式”尝试
items.raw_excerpt: 智能体（AI Agent）正在成为人工智能演进的核心方向。它既是人机协同的桥梁，也是机器自主决策的载体，未来甚至可能成为智能社会的基础单元。 然而，今天支撑智能体的基础设施依旧停留在一种“机械拼装”的状态：大量的胶水代码勉强将分散的环节拼接在一起，算力资源在静默中闲置，昂贵的训练任务可能因一次突发故障而瞬间中断，庞大的运维团队则日复一日地陷入告警与排障的泥潭。 传统 IaaS 与 PaaS 的工具链加人工模式已经无法承载智能体生产的复杂性与动态性。 为了突破这一局限，我们需要基础设施本身实现一次范式级的进化，让它能够具备自主决策、协同和演化的能力，凭借智能体的主动性和智能性，做出比人工更快、更精准、更优的判断，承担过去依赖专家经验才能完成的复杂任务，从而实现更高效、更稳定、更普惠的 AI 创新。 正是在这样的背景下，无问芯穹推出了 “基础设施智能体蜂群”。 这一体系基于其多年在 AI-Native 基础设施的技术积累和服务经验，融合多智能体协同架构与行业实际场景需求，构建出一种新一代基础设施智能化方案。 蜂群通过封装模型筛选、平台管家、资源运营、答疑排障、智算运维等模块，形成了一个高度自治、动态协作的体系，打造了覆盖基础设施全生命周期的智能感知、智能决策与智能执行闭环，显著提升资源利用率和运维效率，以同样的投入实现百倍规模的运维能力扩展。 在传统模式中，算力平台的使用与运维往往是割裂的，开发、运维和运营团队各自为战，流程繁琐而低效。而在无问芯穹的蜂群体系中，这一切被统一在一个智能化的闭环中。 无论是算力池化后的弹性调度，还是跨地域集群的统一运营，亦或是高性能网络、存储与安全的协同管控，蜂群架构都能自适应地进行动态优化。这使得算力平台不再只是被动的资源提供者，而是以自治化的方式主动服务于研发任务和业务目标，最终带来资源利用率、能效比和可靠性的全面提升。 蜂群内部的不同智能体各

title_i18n.zh: 基础设施进入 Agent 时代：无问芯穹的“蜂群式”尝试
title_i18n.en: Infrastructure Enters the Agent Era: InnoPeak's "Swarm-Style" Experiment
title_i18n.es: La infraestructura entra en la era de los agentes: el intento de enjambre de Wu Wen Xin Qiong.

excerpt_i18n.en: AI Agents are becoming the core direction of artificial intelligence evolution. They serve as both the bridge for human-machine collaboration and the vehicle for autonomous machine decision-making, potentially forming the foundational units of an intelligent society in the future. However, the infrastructure supporting agents today remains in a state of "mechanical assembly": extensive glue code barely connects scattered components, computing resources lie idle in silence, costly training tasks can be abruptly interrupted by a single failure, and large operations teams are mired daily in alerts and troubleshooting. The traditional toolchain-plus-manual approach of IaaS and PaaS can no longer handle the complexity and dynamism of agent production. To overcome this limitation, the infrastructure itself must undergo a paradigm-level evolution, enabling autonomous decision-making, collaboration, and adaptation. By leveraging agents' initiative and intelligence, it can make faster, more accurate, and superior judgments than humans, taking on complex tasks that previously relied on expert experience, thereby achieving more efficient, stable, and accessible AI innovation. Against this backdrop, Wu Wen Xin Qiong has launched the "Infrastructure Agent Swarm." This system builds on years of technical accumulation and service experience in AI-Native infrastructure, integrating multi-agent collaborative architecture with real-world industry needs to create a new generation of intelligent infrastructure solutions. The swarm encapsulates modules such as model selection, platform management, resource operation, troubleshooting, and intelligent computing maintenance, forming a highly integrated framework.
excerpt_i18n.es: Los agentes de inteligencia artificial se están convirtiendo en la dirección central de la evolución de la IA. Son tanto un puente para la colaboración humano-máquina como un vehículo para la toma de decisiones autónoma de las máquinas, y en el futuro incluso podrían convertirse en la unidad básica de una sociedad inteligente. Sin embargo, la infraestructura que sostiene a los agentes hoy sigue estancada en un estado de "ensamblaje mecánico": gran cantidad de código adhesivo une a duras penas eslabones dispersos, los recursos de computación permanecen inactivos en silencio, las costosas tareas de entrenamiento pueden interrumpirse instantáneamente por una falla imprevista, mientras que los equipos de operaciones se hunden día tras día en el pantano de alertas y resolución de problemas. El modelo tradicional de cadenas de herramientas IaaS y PaaS combinado con intervención manual ya no puede soportar la complejidad de la producción de agentes.

items.title: SAP and OpenAI partner to launch sovereign ‘OpenAI for Germany’
items.raw_excerpt: SAP and OpenAI launch OpenAI for Germany, a 2026 partnership to bring secure, sovereign AI to Germany’s public sector, enabling safe, efficient public services.

title_i18n.en: SAP and OpenAI partner to launch sovereign ‘OpenAI for Germany’
title_i18n.zh: SAP与OpenAI合作推出德国专属版"OpenAI德国"。
title_i18n.es: SAP y OpenAI se asocian para lanzar un 'OpenAI para Alemania' soberano.

excerpt_i18n.en: SAP and OpenAI launch OpenAI for Germany, a 2026 partnership to bring secure, sovereign AI to Germany’s public sector, enabling safe, efficient public services.
excerpt_i18n.zh: SAP与OpenAI联合推出"德国版OpenAI"，这项2026年启动的合作计划旨在为德国公共部门提供安全可控的人工智能技术，助力公共服务的智能化高效运行。
excerpt_i18n.es: SAP y OpenAI lanzan OpenAI para Alemania, una alianza para 2026 que llevará inteligencia artificial segura y soberana al sector público alemán, permitiendo servicios públicos seguros y eficientes.

items.title: SimpleFold: Folding Proteins is Simpler than You Think
items.raw_excerpt:
Protein folding models have achieved groundbreaking results since the introduction of AlphaFold2, typically built via a
combination of integrating domain-expertise into its architectural designs and training pipelines. Nonetheless, given the
success of generative models across different but related problems, it is natural to question whether these architectural
designs are a necessity to build performant models. In this paper, we introduce SimpleFold, the first flow-matching based
protein folding model that solely uses general purpose transformer layers. Instead of relying on expensive…

excerpt_i18n.zh: 自AlphaFold2问世以来，蛋白质折叠模型取得了突破性进展，其构建通常通过将领域专业知识融入架构设计和训练流程来实现。
excerpt_i18n.es: Los modelos de plegamiento de proteínas han logrado resultados revolucionarios desde la introducción de AlphaFold2, construidos generalmente mediante una combinación de integración de experiencia de dominio en sus diseños arquitectónicos y flujos de entrenamiento. N
